content: colors flow from stripe to stripe in this ombré mosaic stitch blanket made in crib size for perfect snuggle for throw size see our fern lake blanket 1 **finished measurements** approximately 32 /81 cm wide x 44 /112 cm long **yarn** berroco vintage baby 2 50 g 3 balls each #10002 pearl c1 #10072 toast c2 #10071 pepper c3 and #10012 lagoon c4 **needles and notions** 32 /80 cm circular needle size 6/4 mm or size to obtain gauge tapestry needle **gauge** 24 sts and 40 row = 4 /10 cm in pattern stitch 1 https //www berroco com/patterns/fern-lake 2 https //www berroco com/yarns/berroco-vintage-baby
